attributes.action: Reverse the decision for mandatory vaccination for frontline nhs staff
attributes.additional_details: Something needs to be done about all these frontline NHS staff losing their jobs if they are not fully vaccinated! It’s a personal choice! It’s been fine for them to work for the last 2 years through it without it so what’s the difference! The government has no right to tell them take it or lose their job when the evidence clearly shows you spread covid and get covid with or without vaccine! This how no baring on there job! Tell me how this benefits you!  is disgusting and way too far!
attributes.background: I want you to reverse the mandatory vaccinations for NHS frontline workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
